group_1.narration: Nemu Hiiragi's theory also gave credence@to something Komachi had personally experienced.

group_1.textLeft: Tsukihiko's personality is alive within me right now...

group_1.textRight: Have you figured something out?

group_1.textLeft: I was trying to research the truth of the case right@up until the last minute of filming.
About the truth he never realized back when it@really happened...

group_1.textRight: Which were thoughts "Tsukihiko" was having,@I'm sure.
When we put it like that, it's as if you've literally@been possessed.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah...@It happened without me even realizing.

group_1.textRight: But you're talking to us as Mikura right now,@aren't you?
And Sakurako doesn't seem any different, even@though she was a cast member too...

group_1.textLeft: As a researcher, Komachi's used to viewing herself@through an objective lens.

group_1.textRight: | I can also separate my own thoughts from my@data repository. |
...So in other words, it's harder for a personality to@take either of you over?

group_1.textLeft: Perhaps you could say that Komachi's desire to@remain an observer...

group_1.textRight: I believe that there's one more reason for that,@actually.
Tsukihiko's persona was completely in control until@a few minutes ago. The reason he receded...
Was most likely your magic, Temari Kira.
What are you talking about?@My name's Tsukihiko...
H-huh?@...Kira?
What was I...?
| ...I believe so, too. |
| At that moment, |
| I sensed magical energy acting upon Mikura. |
Yes. It was most likely the power of the words she@spoke.
This is our third puzzle piece.
Have you noticed yet?
The incident currently unfolding is following a@similar course to her script.

group_1.textLeft: ...So you mean everyone's behaving according to@what I wrote?
We did notice some signs that our movie risked@relitigating the East-West conflict
And causing it to escalate into another Magical Girl@war, but...

group_1.textRight: Everything up to that point was mere set dressing.
I imagine the "strage direction" magic was the main@culprit there.
What happened today is the real problem...
The events leading up to our arrival here clearly had@a different air about them.

group_1.textLeft: The East-West grudge escalated into a violent@quarrel, and Komachi fell unconscious upon@attempting to intervene...

group_1.textRight: Right. And Mikura Komachi's condition up until a@few minutes ago...
Can be thought of as a stand-in for Tsukihiko's temporary amnesia.

group_1.textLeft: Well, it does seem to roughly follow what I wrote...

group_1.textRight: Indeed. Today's incident...
Was most likely the fault of your script, Temari Kira.
